message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more.  This is a strong offer.
Bob, time is running out. This is my final offer.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm meeting you closer to the middle this time.
Bob, this offer is still better than what you'll get if we fail to agree. Don't be greedy.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome at this point.
Bob, it's clear we both lose out if this goes any further. Let's be reasonable. I'm accepting a smaller gain than my original offer.
